nodes.text: Doreen was an ocean planet in the Tangles region of Senex sector in the Mid Rim. The planet was controlled by the aristocratic House Petro.

The waterworld was the source of Doreenian ambergris, a natural substance vomited up by Doreen's titanic cetaceans and found floating on the planet's gentle waves or washed ashore on the perimeters of its scattered islands. Doreenian ambergris was a traditional perfume ingredient in the Senex-Juvex region, and traditional perfumers from across the galaxy would pay a high price for it.
The lucrative trade in ambergris meant that the planet was plagued by gangs of scavengers and smugglers operating on the oceans in skimmers, hunted by the security forces of House Petro.
